original_title: Rhys Jones: The Clues That Caught the Killer
overview: Documentary examining the investigation into the murder of 11-year-old Rhys Jones in Liverpool. Detectives involved in one of the most notorious cases of recent times recall how Sean Mercer was convicted for Rhys's murder, despite little evidence and an unwillingness among witnesses to talk.
title: Rhys Jones: The Clues That Caught the Killer
